metadata.Title: CVE-2014-1471 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
SQL injection vulnerability in the StateGetStatesByType function in Kernel/System/State.pm in Open Ticket Request System (OTRS) 3.1.x before 3.1.19, 3.2.x before 3.2.14, and 3.3.x before 3.3.4 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via vectors related to a ticket search URL.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-1471` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

otrs - 3.3.5-1
otrs2 - 3.3.5-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: otrs2 package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.3.5-1').
